subject: No shipment after being over a week since buying?
description_text:
Hi there I purchased the simsonn HS pro and i purchased it on the 13th. I
never got a tracking number and it's never arrived. Please respond within a
timely manner thank you, the order number is #SSN4809

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 10148 中
